thread.title: Holiday Inn Express & Suites Atlanta North Perimeter Provides Affordable Lodging for Georgia Tech vs. Alcorn State Game
thread.title_full: Holiday Inn Express & Suites Atlanta North Perimeter Provides Affordable Lodging for Georgia Tech vs. Alcorn State Game - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Holiday Inn Express & Suites Atlanta North Perimeter Provides Affordable Lodging for Georgia Tech vs. Alcorn State Game
text:
Holiday Inn Express & Suites Atlanta North Perimeter offers affordable lodging for the Georgia Tech vs. Alcorn State football game on September 3, 2015.
 ATLANTA, GA, August 29, Fans attending the Georgia Tech and Alcorn State football game on September 3 will find affordable lodging at the Holiday Inn Express & Suites Atlanta North Perimeter Hotel . Kickoff time is 7:30pm at Bobby Dodd Stadium in Atlanta. This is the season opener for both teams. The Yellow Jackets are ranked No. 16 in the first Associated Press Top 25 poll of the season.
"We are happy to welcome football fans in town for the Georgia Tech and Alcorn State game," shares Shabbir Lightwala, General Manager at the Holiday Inn Express & Suites Atlanta North Perimeter. "Our convenient location near the Dunwoody MARTA Station allows our guests to take a MARTA train to this Thursday evening game," explains Lightwala.
A popular choice among Sandy Springs hotels, the Holiday Inn Express & Suites Atlanta Perimeter hotel North features comfortable guest rooms with Simply Smart beds and free high speed Internet. Extended Stay Suites are well equipped with microwave, mini refrigerator, and dishwasher. The complimentary Express Start Breakfast Bar features hot cinnamon rolls, a guest favorite. The refreshing outdoor pool is the perfect place to cool off and unwind after a busy day. Other hotel amenities include a fitness center, business center, and free garage parking. The Holiday Inn Express & Suites Atlanta North Perimeter provides complimentary weekday shuttle service within a 3-mile radius including Perimeter Mall and the Dunwoody MARTA Station. Downtown Atlanta, the Buckhead area, and the airport are easily reached by MARTA train.
Current lodging specials at this Perimeter Center hotel include the In-Room Pizza Package and the Romantic Escape Package. AAA and senior rates are available. IHG Rewards Club members will earn points toward free hotel nights.
For additional game information and tickets, visit www.ramblinwreck.com . To book your stay at the Holiday Inn Express & Suites Atlanta North Perimeter, call 404-250-4450 or visit www.PERIMETERHOTEL.com .
About Holiday Inn Express Hotel & Suites Atlanta North-Perimeter/Dunwoody
The Holiday Inn Express Hotel & Suites Atlanta North-Perimeter/Dunwoody is directly off Georgia 400 and I-285. This means they're just minutes from several corporate offices and training centers. Additionally, Buckhead, Sandy Springs, Roswell, the Dunwoody Medical Centers, Northside Hospital, Children's Health Care, St. Joseph's, and the Dunwoody MARTA station are nearby. Enjoy a memorable stay at our modern Perimeter hotel, part of Atlanta's upscale corporate Perimeter Center. With our courteous staff, reasonable rates, and terrific amenities, this Atlanta Perimeter hotel is the place to "Stay Smart" in the Perimeter Center area.
For more information visit: http://www.PERIMETERHOTEL.com
For all media inquiries, please contact:
Allison Reinert
